results.adx_keywords: Weddings and Engagements;Hurricane Nicole (2022);Maples, Marla;Trump, Donald J;Trump, Tiffany (1993- );Mar-a-Lago (Palm Beach, Fla);Florida
results.title: Tiffany Trump Weds at Mar-a-Lago
results.abstract: Tiffany Trump and Michael Boulos, whose wedding was almost derailed by Hurricane Nicole, treated their guests to an American-Lebanese celebration at her father’s private residence.

media.caption: Marla Maples, left, Michael Boulos, Tiffany Trump and former President Donald J. Trump at Mar-a-Lago on Saturday.

results.adx_keywords: Aviation Accidents, Safety and Disasters;Airlines and Airplanes;Air Shows and Air Racing;Military Aircraft;Wings Over Dallas;Dallas (Tex)
results.byline: By Margarita Birnbaum and Vimal Patel
results.title: Two Planes Collide in Midair at Dallas Air Show, F.A.A. Says
results.abstract: The crash involved two World War II-era planes at an air show in Dallas with as many as six people on board, though officials as of Saturday night had not yet confirmed casualties.

results.adx_keywords: Television;Comedy and Humor;internal-sub-only
results.title: Seth Meyers Is Thrilled by G.O.P.’s New Treatment of Trump
results.abstract: “Republicans are running away from Trump faster than Josh Hawley on Jan. 6,” Meyers joked on Thursday.

media.caption: Seth Meyers joked that seeing Fox News turn on Trump is like watching “‘Alien vs. Predator,’ or ‘Godzilla vs. Kong,’ or Biden vs. stairs.”

results.adx_keywords: Deaths (Obituaries);Pop and Rock Music;Parker, Mimi (1967-2022);Sparhawk, Alan;Sub Pop Records;Low (Music Group)
results.title: Mimi Parker, Moody Alt-Rock Vocalist, Is Dead at 55
results.abstract: Her influential band, Low, emerged in the 1990s, but its minimalist sound stood in sharp contrast to the anthems of angst that came to define the grunge era.

media.caption: Mimi Parker of Low in performance in Paris in 2011. The band, which she founded with her husband, Alan Sparhawk, remained an influential and acclaimed act for nearly 30 years.

results.adx_keywords: Midterm Elections (2022);Right-Wing Extremism and Alt-Right;Elections, House of Representatives;Boebert, Lauren;Republican Party;Colorado
results.title: Will a Recount Decide Lauren Boebert’s Race? It Could Take Weeks to Sort Out.
results.abstract: As of Friday, Ms. Boebert, a far-right provocateur in the House, led by less than 1,200 votes over the Democrat Adam Frisch in Colorado’s Third District race.

media.caption: Representative Lauren Boebert of Colorado, a Republican, and her challenger, Adam Frisch, are locked in a tighter than expected race for Colorado’s Third Congressional District.
media.copyright: William Woody for The New York Times

results.adx_keywords: Midterm Elections (2022);United States Politics and Government;Presidential Election of 2024;Trump, Donald J;Republican Party
results.byline: By Lisa Lerer and Reid J. Epstein
results.title: Trump Angst Grips Republicans (Again) as 2024 Announcement Looms
results.abstract: While Republicans pick up the pieces from the midterm elections, former President Donald J. Trump is already forcing them to take sides in the next election.

media.caption: After a string of midterm losses by candidates Donald J. Trump supported, there are some signs of another Republican effort to inch the party away from the former president.
media.copyright: Rebecca Noble for The New York Times

results.title: There’s a Lot Congress Can Do Now, and It Starts With Changing a Law That Trump Exploited

results.title: Tina Kotek, a Progressive, Will Be Oregon’s Next Governor
results.abstract: She will also be one of two of the nation’s first openly lesbian governors.

media.caption: Tina Kotek, at a rally last month in Portland, Ore. She campaigned as a protector of the state’s liberal values.

results.title: Jury Says Paul Haggis Raped Woman After Film Premiere
results.abstract: Mr. Haggis, a writer of the Oscar-winning films “Crash” and “Million Dollar Baby,” was sued by a film publicist after a 2013 encounter in his New York apartment.

media.caption: Paul Haggis said that a sexual encounter after a film premiere in 2013 was consensual. His accuser said she was raped in his apartment.

results.title: Sean Patrick Maloney on His Loss, the Media and A.O.C.
results.abstract: Mr. Maloney said that he and other New York Democrats were unable to overcome suburban fears of crime. He also had some harsh words for Representative Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez.

media.caption: Representative Sean Patrick Maloney said that Gov. Kathy Hochul's struggles in the suburbs hurt Democratic candidates in those areas.

results.adx_keywords: Child Labor;Meatpacking Plants and Slaughterhouses;Labor and Jobs;Hazardous and Toxic Substances;Workplace Hazards and Violations;Packer's Sanitation Services Inc Ltd;JBS SA;Turkey Valley Farms LLC;Labor Department (US);Nebraska;Wisconsin;Minnesota
results.title: Labor Department Finds 31 Children Cleaning Meatpacking Plants
results.abstract: Packers Sanitation Services, a food safety contractor, hired children as young as 13 to clean dangerous equipment on overnight shifts, the department said. Several suffered chemical burns.

media.caption: An image that the Labor Department included in paperwork seeking an injunction against Packers Sanitation Services showed a worker using a high-powered hose at a meatpacking plant in Worthington, Minn.

results.adx_keywords: Television;Dresses;Costumes;Diana, Princess of Wales
results.title: ‘It Was Important to Get That Right’: How ‘The Crown’ Tackled the Revenge Dress
results.abstract: The series’s costume designer discussed what was sure to be the most closely scrutinized re-creation of the new season, Diana’s shoulder-baring little black dress.

media.caption: Elizabeth Debicki as Princess Diana in the latest season of “The Crown.”

results.adx_keywords: Midterm Elections (2022);Elections, Senate;Masto, Catherine Cortez;Laxalt, Adam;Democratic Party;Clark County (Nev)
results.title: Mail Ballots Around Las Vegas Are Likely to Put Democrats Ahead
results.abstract: Senator Catherine Cortez Masto is within 1,000 votes of overtaking her Republican opponent, Adam Laxalt, and the ballots remaining in Clark County are expected to favor her.

media.caption: An election worker inspected a mail-in ballot in the count room at the Clark County Election Department in North Las Vegas, Nev., on Saturday.
media.copyright: Steve Marcus/Las Vegas Sun, via Associated Press

results.title: Internal Documents Show How Close the F.B.I. Came to Deploying Spyware

results.title: Arizona’s Top Races Near the Finish in a Tension-Filled Battleground
results.abstract: Senator Mark Kelly, a Democrat, holds an edge in his bid for re-election, but the race for governor appears to be a true tossup, even as several Republican candidates sow doubts about the results.

media.caption: Ballots being processed this week at the Maricopa County Elections Center in Phoenix. All four of the state’s top races were uncalled as of midday Friday.

results.title: Gallagher, Watermelon-Smashing Comedian, Is Dead at 76
results.abstract: He called himself “The Wizard of Odd” for his outrageous stage act, making him one of the most recognizable comedians of the 1980s.

media.caption: Gallagher in 1985. He said it was his job to “yell at the world.”
